title: Spacecraft-collected (EFI) Electric field - V. Angelopoulos, J. Bonnell & F. Mozer (UCB, NASA NAS5-02099)

info.contact: V. Angelopoulos, J. Bonnell & F. Mozer @ UCB, NASA NAS5-02099

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: thc_eff_q_pha_epoch: Electric field Instrument Spin-averaged (EFF_Q_PHA, approx. 3 sec time resolution) epoch variable

parameters.name: thc_eff_q_pha
parameters.description: EFF_Q_PHA (Data Quality Parameter: equal to the cosine of the angle between the spin-fit E34 electric field and the spin-fit E12 electric field. Good values are near 1.0)
